channel.title: 508 Error. PLEASE HELP!
channel.description: Hello. In my 508 Private server, I was given an error after coding NPCs. I was in the [sub][sup]"Bin>Data>NPCs>NPCSpawn"[/sup][/sub] After going in there, I posted the NPC Number and coords. I compiled, and everything went perfectly fine, until I ran the server, and it gave me this error. [img]http://www.myspacegens.com/images/temporary/7965078699/animation.gif?2253315[/img] I have never had an error after running the server, only in the compiler. Any help is appreciated. Thank you.

item.title: 508 Error. PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @MortalPK MortalPK
item.description:
@MortalPK wrote:

[quote=“halolouis, post:10, topic:348538”]If you still have problem. Just go into npsspawn.cfg and go through all the npcs making sure no space is after the zero.
Which means no spaces allowed in npcspawn only tabs… also do not use wordpad… Notepad ftw or jedit lol
cheers[/quote]
Haha, thats exactly what was wrong. I hadn’t coded NPC’s into a 508 Server before, and didn’t know.Thank you.
__
EDIT: Now when I run the server, everything goes fine until login, when it says
“Unexpected response from Server”
This has never happened either, and I need help

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Error. PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @halolouis halolouis
item.description:
@halolouis wrote:

do a ctrl-f and search for the number 0 with a space after it. I bet you find it in seconds

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Error. PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @MortalPK MortalPK
item.description:
@MortalPK wrote:

Hello.
In my 508 Private server, I was given an error after coding NPCs.
I was in the [sub][sup]“Bin>Data>NPCs>NPCSpawn”[/sup][/sub]
After going in there, I posted the NPC Number and coords. I compiled, and everything went perfectly fine, until I ran the server, and it gave me this error.

I have never had an error after running the server, only in the compiler.
Any help is appreciated. Thank you.
